She's also a massage therapist and she and Sheila gave me great tips and ideas about working out my muscles and eating much healthier.Great massage spa and I can't wait to book my next appointment!

0.description: Everyone/everything about this location is fantastic. The two one star reviewers bringing down their rating is a shame. This location is so helpful, everyone has great customer service skills; from the therapists (worked with Glenn, Tashata, Evelyn)  to the front desk staff (Matt!). The massage therapists are all professional and when someone says you are not working with them, it means you are not relaxed and your muscles are fighting them which is no benefit to you, so I am sure the reviewer that gave the one star about that must have tight muscles.  I have had many massages and came to Elements because I wanted to do a couples massage. After that massage I was hooked and then signed up for the monthly massage program. I am a fun of high end spas offering massages and not into chain places, but this location I feel operates similar to a high end spa. There rooms and lobby are clean, they offer water while you wait, and after. They have heated massage tables. Seriously I can not speak more highly about this place.

2.description: I have been going here since December of 2015, they are so good i started going to the gym and working out. Today i treated my wife because she has been working out for a month now. She is hooked.

5.description: Elements on S Michigan Ave is the place to go to support you with your well being! From the first time I went there Matt and Nicko both great at  the reception and make you feel very welcome. Warm and very professional & inviting.They have you relax before they nmatch you up to a therapist.It's not some pretentious spa..it's where you go to create a partner in your well being. My therapist is Yolanda, and boy she is a master!! She is a therapist not a massuese and there is a huge difference! I have been for 3 massages so far and each time Yolanda gets more familiar with my body and where the pain is and she takes care of it..no pain and better mobility!  I am asked about the pressure, I am asked where I hurt, or have had any injuries..I am treated with respect and made to feel very relaxed and comfortable. The place is spotlessI always feel refreshed when I leave, with more energy! I will be joining their membership program as the prices then make it more reasonable. To have a group of people who genuinely care about your well being is wonderful and I am delighted with this Elements, with their extraordinary team ! Thank you Yolanda..You are AWESOME! I have noticed in the last year many massage offers in the downtown loop area and this by far is the BEST!

6.description: I came here for a deep tissue Massage, my therapist is Evelyn. She's helped break through the Tense Knots on my shoulder and neck, the pain is really rigorous. But I enjoyed it so much and  I fell very release afterward.

7.description: Staff is wonderful , I always get the appointment time I want, and Niki has done amazing jobs at my massages.  She is very considerate about pressure and always asks my preferences before she begins. Her massages are amazing. The Wellness package is a great deal!  Better pricing that most in the area. It's my new favorite way to treat myself.

8.description: I used to visit the Elements in Orland Park, that is now closed. That is where I met Jennifer.  She is wonderful. I went monthly when I was pregnant and she is always very attentive and works on the problem spots I tell her about.  She remembered me month to month and each of my concerns.  When the Orland location closed, I started going to the Western Springs location. Turns out Jennifer moved to this location, so that was perfect!  I was so excited when they opened the South Loop location! It is clean, close to public transportation, and everyone is VERY friendly.  I was able to transfer my membership from Western Springs to South Loop with no problems. I see both Jennifer and Tashata at this location and they are wonderful. I tell them exactly what my problem area is or if I am just looking for relaxation.  I went numerous times before and after running the Chicago marathon, not only did they work on the obvious massage part but both did different stretches with me to help keep me loose.  I am booking my next appointment as we speak!

9.description: wow.  can't say I've ever been more let down by a massage.  My masseuse was just awkward and rude, she said that I wasn't working with her, and kept telling me how great she was at what she did; and basically-- that the problem was me.  Yikes.  Not to mention after I was done, my back and body was really in pain.  I believe that she was sincerely trying to work out some stuff, but that is not relaxing for me; I'm not looking for a back adjustment and to be in physical pain during a massage.  Maybe I've just had crappy massages in the past, but this--was one where I am not in ANY hurry to return.  I had a hard time really leaving any money, let along a decent tip.   I guess I've gotten more relaxation and good feeling rubbing up against a wall then this massage.  Look elsewhere.

10.description: I had $900 I wanted to spend on a package to get a series of massages. I called yesterday, and an employee who really had no clue how to handle my call said she would reach out to a manager and call me back in ten minutes. I told her it was time sensitive... 24 hours later and still no call. If I was her manager I would fire her, if it's the manager's fault then they should resign for losing out on a $900 easy sale!

4.description: I had just been running ragged for about two weeks and I could barely move my right arm without cringing it hurt so bad.  I had been wanting to try this location since it opened (I had been to the location they have in Western Springs, IL) and as fate would have it, they had a gap in their schedule at just the right time! It went great.  They offer validated parking, and even though I actually didn't need to use it that day, as someone that spends a lot of time driving around for my job, it was a big plus.  When I got there, I liked the vibe.  It's in a store front of the swanky 'Columbian' condo building at Michigan and Roosevelt.  As for the brass tacks, the massage itself was AMAZING!  Whoever sang that song about 'hurt so good,' could have been talking about Emerita, the woman that gave me my massage.  It's really rare that I can find someone that can really go deep enough into the tissue to be satisfying to me, but she did!  She was careful to make sure she wasn't ever applying too much pressure (as if there is such a thing) but not in an annoying way and while she was polite, she didn't make me feel like I needed to make small talk and in fact at the end I almost / kind-of-did doze(d) off.  I went out the front to pay after I took like 10 minutes to get my bearings and get dressed, and I was given a water and a friendly exchange of conversation on my way out!

1.description: Stick to the locations on Michigan Avenue. It opened a couple of months ago and I've been there a few times. Associates are inattentive and selection is poor. I walked in yesterday to see associates standing around front, no one offered to help. I even waited at the register for an associate.

0.description: The most friendly and helpful of any BR I've been too. They also seem to always have the best items on sale.

12.description: Top notch bike store!!!! Dennis and Andre were amazingly patient and helpful. Dennis worked within my budget and we walked out of the store with 2 amazing bikes and a wealth full of knowledge. I don't know much about bikes and Dennis and Andre were ever so patient with my questions. I can't say enough good things about this store and Dennis's staff. I will go to them for every bike need I have. Great great great great experience. Thank you!!!!!!

3.description: Friendly and knowledgable service. I was helped as soon as I walked in the door. I believe the owner helped me and he not only gave me a discount for being a first time shopper but gave me great advice.

1.description: I commute year round, I can do all basic repairs myself. I can walk the walk and talk the talk. As such, I usually make friends w bike shop employees fairly quickly.Not this place. I have an issue w a crankset, I happened to roll by and went in to ask the guy if he could check the tightness of the crankarm and BB. In my experience, this is something that's done for free, although I'd be willing to pay if necessary.Dude working was almost standoffish when I asked him if he thought it could be an issue of the BB getting wonky or cranks coming undone, with wonderful phrases like "Well, I can't say b/c I don't know the bike's entire history," or "I mean, I'm *just* speculating here, so I'm really not sure." I asked questions of him b/c he's the expert, and every.single.answer I got was chilly, at best. It's just odd to me, b/c I have NEVER experienced this from any of the other 6-8 bike shops I've regularly gone to in my 8 years of living in Chicago. The guy's final suggestion was, if I wanted him to, he could remove the entire BB and crankset, check its tightness and threading, and completely reinstall it.I came in asking him to check the tighness of the crank arm, and he responded by suggesting we totally rip out and reinstall the BB and crankset. That's like going in to check the pressure of the tires in your car, and having the mechanic suggest you buy new tires b/c the pressure is low.That and, $9 inner tubes. I get it, guys, rent is more expensive in Lakeview, but wow. WTF.Normally I'm not one to complain about the attitude of an employee at a bike shop, at all, but this guy supremely rubbed me the wrong way. Never again.

2.description: I've been to On The Route several times from the time they were on south Michigan to now and the service is always excellent. I've had flat tires fixed in 20 minutes and tune ups that pro longed the life of my  trek 7.5.Jeff is the absolute best! He's always kind and efficient and is a pro on everything bike!I've recently purchased by first high end bike a Raleigh Willard 2 cyclocross and it's been nothing short of amazing.

9.description: I went in twice in the last several weeks to inquire about a new bike and made a purchase on the second time. Dennis, the owner, was extremely courteous and helpful. I already knew which bike I wanted coming in, but the professionalism and respect that Dennis and Jeff displayed was what eventually convinced me to make a purchase at the shop. During my visits, I saw the two of them treat every single customer from different backgrounds of riding with the same respect that they deserve, from the guy with the expensive cyclocross to the old lady with her cruiser bike who was just beginning to ride. Prices are very affordable for brand-new bikes and labor isn't very expensive either. They have a great selection of accessories as well.

10.description: Amazing Bike Shop!!!!  I needed to ship my bike to Minneapolis and Jeff was super accommodating!  I've never experienced such friendly and accommodating customer service!

13.description: Came in for a tube change last night while it was extremely busy and ended up being helped really quickly. The guy (Andre was his name I think) helped me and 2 other customers simultaneously and also made us all feel like we had his attention as he worked quickly on our repairs. He was awesome, 5 stars, definitely coming back soon.

16.description: Knowledgeable, quick, and genuinely nice dudes. Had a good selection of moderately-priced parts, and totally reasonable labor costs. Jeff even adjusted a couple minor things free of charge while he had my bike on the stand, and took his time in explaining the different repair options that I had.

6.description: Love these guys. They're always friendly, helpful and will fix your bike as quickly as possible. They're definitely my go-to bike shop.

15.description: The fourth star is for a super convenient location close to the loop.  The fifth star is for a job well done.  Popped a spoke on the way to the office last week and rather than ride a wobbling wheel all the way to my usual shop in Evanston after work, I rode the few blocks down Dearborn during lunch.  Despite the extra work to drill out a stripped rotor screw to get to the hub (at no charge), the wheel was trued, tires filled and brakes recalibrated in no time and I was back at the grind before anyone knew I was away.  Top quality work and despite no desire to experience more mishaps on the way to work, I'm sure I'll be back.

0.description: In and out, not even 10 minutes, and my brakes are fixed and tightened up. Go here.The owner is very straightforward and expresses both care and honesty. I feel like I can trust him with my ride. They made an adjustment on my brakes to where they feel tighter, faster and safer now.Remember to get a student discount fellow college goers!

5.description: Just picked up a 2015 Raleigh Roper here. Graduating from a very old mountain bike to my first road/cyclocross/commuter, the two gentlemen were very helpful in providing valuable input to my decision. I also came here when they were having a sale on all of their 2015 models. Got my bike for 50% off. To top it off, they also do Military discounts here. Can't complain about a great establishment!

11.description: Went in for some tubes, picked up a hat I hadn't seen elsewhere. They guys were friendly and quick. I work nearby and was glad to find this resource, as I commute daily on my bike. I'll be back when I need my bike serviced.

8.description: Great experience! I had a tune up done on my bike. It rides like new again!! They were very friendly and quick! The biggest thing that I appreciated is that they didn't try to up sell me with accessories or unnecessary repairs. Definitely will be back! Easy 5 stars.

4.description: I have been in the bicycle business for over 18 years as as a former shop owner, former bike shop employee, and currently a mobile mechanic. These guys are an exception to the Chicago bike shop rules. Jeff took amazing care of me when I stopped in to the Printers Row shop in need of a few small parts. Not only did Jeff display amazing technical instincts, he does so with a smile with no infamous bike shop attitude. James also sets a new standard for bike shop friendliness and knowledge of the industry. This place is a gem. I never met this owner, but if I did, I would tell him how lucky he is to have both of these fine mechanics.

14.description: I had a minor issue that needed immediate attention appear on my bike as I passed by the shop, so I stopped in.  They fixed it quickly and inexpensively.  I was pleasantly surprised, considering the other bike shop in the area is expensive and always has a huge wait time.  I'll definitely stop by On The Route next time I need gear in the area.

7.description: Jeff at On The Route is incredibly knowledgeable about all aspects of any bike. I am lucky to live in the building above On The Route and even in the short time they have been here they have helped my girlfriend and me many times. Just yesterday I took my vintage moped - not even a bicycle- because my mirror wouldn't stay on and Jeff went above and beyond to grind down a part to retrofit my mirror. Quite simply he solved my problem and was eager to help out. Definitely a first class job.

58.description: Loved my highlights done by Emad he's amazing at what he does! he completely transformed me with this new look and I couldn't be happier

56.description: This is place is awesome. I've been coming to Emad for 5 years now. I searched high and low before finding these guys. I have curly thick hair and always leave feeling and looking great. It's a full service salon. Ahmed is the best threader. Great service, quality and atmosphere. Mish is always so helpful and friendly. All amazing guys!!!

29.description: I was hesitant to try this place without knowing anyone that had been here. I was quite attached to my stylist in LA and since I moved here I had kept putting off getting a cut. I tried one other place a year ago and was left feeling "ok", but I LOVED my cut after leaving Trio. I wouldn't hesitate to come back here. As long as I don't move out of the city, my loyalties will be to this salon for any hair styling needs. Truthfully, no one would have ever compared to my LA guy, but this salon comes amazingly close and for a fraction of the price. THANK YOU!!!

42.description: Mish is the best hairdresser I have ever had.  He is excellent with cut and color.  The last time I left there, I hadn't walked even 30 feet, and I was stopped on the street by some women having a drink, and they raved about my hair. Mish is a miracle worker!

23.description: Five stars for the warm and hospitable staff, and first-class service. Emad is truly a masterful stylist! I walked into Trio after a botched haircut from my regular stylist of 11 years and Emad not only listened to my concerns but did so with a sense of patience, warmth, and confident professionalism that made me feel safe to trust him with the task of rehabilitating my hair. I felt completely comfortable and at ease as Emad skillfully cut away at my hair, and the end result exceeded my hopes. After, he taught me how to style and care for my hair; I could tell as he shared with me his instructions how passionate he is about his craft and how much he cares about his clients' satisfaction. My great experience with Emad has convinced me to turn to only Trio for my hair care needs from now on.

47.description: Mish has taken care of my hair for years, and it always looks amazing. Everyone here is friendly, and the stylists are all talented...they work miracles!

8.description: Went in for just a trim and got just a trim! My hair went from a crappy wall with crappy ends to long hair that had a shape and moves and feels nice! During my last haircut, at another place, I asked for a trim and was robbed of 3.5 inches of hair. But here I asked for a trim and got just that! Thank you! I'll be back.

31.description: Emad has been styling my hair for 4 years. Their new salon is so relaxing. Trio 3 and Emad also provide the absolute best Keratin service I've had done in Chicago. It's so nice going to Trio 3 that I find myself going more often for cut, color and Keratin.  Their prices are also very reasonable.

34.description: I decided to give this place a try. I got my hair trimmed today by Mish. He was really nice and asked me what I wanted. My hair is fine and straight. I told him I just wanted a trim with my layers cleaned up. He took his time with my cut and checked with me with the length before he actually cut just to make sure I was comfortable with the amount being taken off. Totally appreciated that. After the cut he dryers my hair and used a round brush and Velcro rollers and my hair actually had volume! Why can't I do this myself? I love my cut and style and even though I just wanted long layers he made it look nice. My husband approved! I will be back!The salon is really nice and inviting, a nice addition to the neighborhood for sure! Glad I decided to check them out! My hair cut was 70 which is about 10 dollars more than what I usually pay but it's worth it. I'm very happy with my cut!

16.description: Okay I hate to tarnish their perfect record but... I HATE MY HAIR CUT. Ugh. It's been two months and I have wanted to like it and get used to it but I just can't. The guy cut it too short and there's nothing you can do when that's the problem. I'll just have to get over myself and wait for it to grow out. I think he probably gave me a good haircut, which is why I am giving 2 stars. And because he was a nice guy. But it wasn't the haircut I asked for, unfortunately. I gave him loads of pictures too. Oh well.

13.description: I have been getting my hair cut and styled by Emad for many years now and was so excited to come to the grand opening of Trio 3! Salon is perfect!  Great location and easy to get to. My thick and coarse/wavy hair is usually a handful but Emad always take extra special care in it and I walk out with silky, bouncy, great looking hair. Even got compliments by my neighbors when I came home:-)The three most important men in "this girl's life"...my dad, my hubby, and Emad! Lol.

11.description: I had my hair  colored by Emad and cut by Ahmed and everything turned out perfect. I had went to a different salon a month ago and spent over 200$ but ending up with a color no different from what I originally had but Emad totally fixed my hair. He was very charismatic and easy to talk to. He kept it real with me and told me he would try to do the best he could without damaging my hair and that's exactly what he did! He was very attentive and cared about how my hair turned out. This is definitely the place to go to get the hair color of your wish! Everyone at the salon was super friendly and I will definitely be back for recoloring!

39.description: I had my hair done by Mish when I was in town from Boston, and I had a great experience. I always found Chitown stylists to be inimitably good, so took time to get my hair done and find a person who could turn my choppy flippy layers into a nice rounded bob. Tried Trio based on Yelp reviews. Mish managed to give me what I wanted despite my near-inscrutable description, and he did not take off too much even by my trim-anxiety standards. My hair is healthier and I got compliments all day. I will come back to Chicago to see him!

37.description: Awesome salon!  I came in needing a haircut badly. When Ahmed sat me down and saw what my over processed hair looked like (I've been dying it various shades of blonde for 2 years and curl/straighten it weekly) he broke the news that there would be no trim.  There was about 5-6 inches of dead ends.  Yikes.  I was scared to death since my hair hasn't been above my shoulders in years but I could tell it needed to be done.  Thank god Ahmed is such a talented stylist.  I came in expecting to leave a few inches shorter but came out love love loving my new short hair!!!  Price was $65 for a cut and blow dry.  Highly recommended.

0.description: I called Trio just the day before my appointment and was able to get a spot with Emad around the time I was looking for. My hair needed work, BADLY, and I could not get an appointment with my regular stylist. Never having been to Trio before I was quite nervous to get my ombré redone by a stylist I only had read about on Yelp.Emad was simply amazing. Not only did my ombré turn out flawless but he gave me great hair-care tips and also a great scalp massage. I would highly recommend Trio for color/cuts. I have not tried their other services yet but will be keeping them in mind for my future no chips and pedis.

38.description: I LOVEEEEEE THIS PLACE!!!!!! THE BEST EXPERIENCE I EVER HAD!!! I had 30 inches long hair and I got Mish to cut my hair up to my shoulders and to give me layers. Then I asked for a turquoise ombre and OMG..THE BEST DECISION OF MY LIFE!! I wish I found them sooner! I had 3 people working on my hair making sure everything went smoothly. THIS SALON ROCKS and trust the reviews on here! Mish and Emad and Jay helped create my pinterest worthy hair ...Thank YOU SO MUCH!

51.description: Ahmed was fantastic.. I can be a pain in the butt when it comes to cutting my hair.. He did exactly what I wanted/ needed! On top of that my blow out was beyond perfection. I left feeling beautiful in my sweats and makeup free face! Thanks Ahmed:)

27.description: In town staying at a hotel nearby and needed a haircut.  Picked Trio 3 based on the reviews and was not disappointed!  Ahmed did a great job and everyone was very nice, you can not go wrong here!

32.description: I received a haircut and style by Mish.  He did an exceptional job at cutting my long/ fine straight hair.  He added perfect layers & used rollers to style it.  Mish took his time. I am definitely coming back to Trio 3 for my next haircut/style! This salon is top notch.

54.description: I highly recommend Nina for fabulous nail services and Mira for soothing, professional facials.  I have known both lovely women for years and am delighted that they are now with Trio3!

48.description: Mish is the best!!! I had recently had my sew in taken down and my hair was all over the place. My hair is natural so most people would have looked at the nest on my head and turned me away but they took me with open arms. Whatever products he used on my hair gave me life! I got trimmed up and deep conditioned I love my hair! I will be back in 2 weeks!

44.description: This is the first time I have gotten my hair professionally colored, and I could not be happier with the results. The atmosphere here is great; everything is so clean and everyone is really friendly. I had my hair highlighted by Mish. I wasn't sure how to describe the color I wanted, but Mish easily helped me figure out what I wanted and a couple of hours later, my hair looked awesome. I also got my hair cut, and again, Mish knew what I wanted even though my description was lacking. This is the best my hair has ever looked. Awesome service, great people and atmosphere, and all at a great price. I am one happy lady.

24.description: I had a wonderful experience at Trio 3 and cannot recommend it enough.  I went in for the first time ready to donate my hair.  To do this, I had to cut almost all of it off.  As is often the case with drastic cuts, I was nervous. However, Emad did a fantastic job.  He also provided me with a discount given that I was donating my hair.  I made a new appointment before I left, because I was so satisfied.  A month later, and all I get is compliments on my hair. I definitely recommend it in terms of professionalism, technique, and price.

7.description: As everyone else has said, this place is amazing!  I just saw Ahmed and got probably the best haircut of my life.  I didn't provide a ton of guidance, as I was hoping that he would use his creative expertise to figure out what works best for me, and he definitely delivered.  I would recommend this place hands down!

49.description: This salon is really a hidden gem of the south loop! I've been going to Mish for about 8 yrs and he has always done such a beautiful job, my hair is always gorgeous and stylish! Emad and Ahmed also do a phenomenal job, Emad did our hair for my sisters wedding and the bride and bridal party were on point!!!! Pay this salon a visit, this is truly such a chic spot with a wonderful and stylish staff!! Love seeing Mish, Emad, and Ahmed when I go!!!

40.description: So excited about the new salon! I have been going to Mish for years. Extremely courteous stylists and staff, chic atmosphere, and they keep your hair not only gorgeous but healthy as well.

53.description: The best hair and nail salon in Chicago. The best no chip manicures from Nina and facials by Mira!  I have been following these technicians since they were at European Touch!  Highly recommend the nicest salon/spa in the South Loop!

30.description: I read about Trio 3 Hair Salon on yelp and decided to check it out.  I had tried to color my platinum blonde hair a light brown (through e salon) by myself..NOTE TO SELF....DON'T TRY TO COLOR YOUR OWN HAIR!!!! The great news is that my horrible mistake led me to this GREAT place.  It's warm, inviting, and Misch did an amazing job correcting the damage that I did (did I mention my hair was blue/green?)  I walked out with a beautiful brunette head of hair and best cut that I have ever had...I would really recommend this place to anyone that isn't happy with their hair.  They take the time to listen and ask you what you would like and then give honest professional guidance.  Their prices are beyond reasonable and I will never go anywhere else.  They made me feel very welcome, and I'm so grateful to have found the salon through YELP.  Trio 3 Hair Salon thanks so very much for your wonderful work...I'll be forever grateful and refer everyone I can to your salon!!  Thanks Misch...you are loved and appreciated!!

46.description: The south loop finally has a beautiful and elegant hair salon for men and women. A full service salon that offers hair, nails and skincare!MISH and EMAD have been doing my hair for about 8 years now. Finding them was a blessing. They have dealt with my constant "it hair style" I've had short hair, long hair, purple, pink, red, highlights, you name it these guys have done it. And my current obsession platinum blonde. There is nothing these guys cannot do! One thing I love about them, no matter what style you choose to go with they will tell you why it will or won't work for you. And 9 times out of 10 their suggestion is better than what you wanted. They are good at what they do! They understand that not every "trend" will "work" for you but, they always have an idea that will blow you mind and you will leave the shop 100% satisfied. Now if you need someone to do your significant other's hair. AHMED is the guy you want! He too has dealt with my "I want my boyfriend to have this hair style" all i have to do is show him a picture or try to explain what "we" want and he will work his magic (Let's be honest when I say "we" I mean me, my boyfriend could care less on what hairstyle I choose for him) he says; "as long as you like it, I like it"... That's a lie, he secretly loves it when someone compliments his hair style. (He willNever admit it, and I'm ok with that) Oh! Don't be fooled, Ahmed is a hair stylist! He also does women's hair. Just like Mish and Emad. Let's not forget they offer nails and skin care! Your go to girls are MIRA and NINA. These ladies couldn't be nicer, and they are good at what they do! For someone who is as picky as me I highly suggest you give them a try. They will not disappoint! Trio3's assistant JAY is an asset to the shop, she is friendly, attentive and makes you feel welcomed. As someone who has worked in customer service for years I'm very picky. Going to Trio3's hair salon is my go to shop! And yes, I highly recommend it. You won't be disappointed.

1.description: This is the best hair salon experience I've had in Chicago, including some very pricey Lincoln Park salons. I got an appointment easily, and they were ready for me when I arrived a few minutes early. Mike's shampoo was sublime and Emad's haircut a masterpiece. Emad took the time to listen to my thoughts and explain exactly what he wanted to do and WHY. I had his undivided attention for the whole appointment and ultimately got the best haircut and blowout I've ever had. It's even better than what I wanted. He's a true artist. Try this place out. It's well worth the money. You won't regret it. Oh, and being cash to tip, always.

55.description: Emad always does an amazing job. Have been going to him for years for color, cut, and style. Love the new salon!

9.description: A few months ago when I was new to this area I was looking for a hair salon. I decided to try this place because of all the excellent reviews. Yelpers did not lie!I have seen Mish 3 times. All three times he colored my blonde hair. Once he cut it. Everyone is so friendly and it is very relaxing. The hair washers are the best! I have found my go to salon!

26.description: TL;DR - Hair cut and color took 4 hours, stylist treated me terribly when I got upset with how long it was taking and was confused about the process. Explanation: I chose this place based on the excellent reviews, but I got my hair cut here today and my experience was sub-par. There were two issues with my cut and color, A) a miscommunication about what I wanted and B) how it was handled.I came in and asked for an ombre that could be added to my existing dark roots and reddish colored hair (my hair is dark brown). Ahmed told me that what I wanted couldn't be done. He spent 10 minutes talking about a different way to do the ombre that I didn't really understand, and I asked for clarification. He said that he would add color to the bottom of my hair, I said fine.An hour and a half later, he was finally done applying the color. He washed it out and when I looked in the mirror I saw that my hair was BLONDE. My hair is very dark and this was NOT what we had agreed to. I was upset because it looked terrible. I said "This is a lot blonder than I was expecting." Ahmed immediately became very defensive and said "You think this is the end of what it looks like? This is only part one of the process, I told you that." No, no he had NOT explained that it was a two step dye process and that it would take upwards of THREE hours to dye. I explained that I had not understood that, as I had never had an ombre take longer than 2 hours before, or take more than one dye, or use BLEACH on my hair. I have had ombre done every 6 months for the last 5 years at many, many places. He said that every other stylist I've ever gone to had done it wrong, and you have to bleach hair first to "lift" the color, and then tone it to the correct color. He lectured me about "lifting" and "bleaching," how he had told me that this was going to be the process, and that everyone else had done it wrong for at least 10 more minutes. I explained that I had not understood this, and did not know it was going to take 3 hours to complete, so I had to reschedule an appointment I had that was coming up in 30 min. Ahmed then let me pick out the color to tone my hair, and had another woman in the salon wash it out. While she was washing my hair she said "I heard you were freaking out about your hair being blonde" in a very judgmental tone. Ok, I misunderstood about the process of the dyeing - I accept some blame for that. But to tell the client to her FACE that in effect you had been gossiping about her behind her back and laughing about her freaking out for something she didn't understand? It was incredibly rude and it made me even more upset.THEN I sat down in the chair for Ahmed to cut my hair and he asked what I did for a living. I told him and he said "So what would you do if I came to you in your industry and told you that everything you were doing was wrong?" Now this made me SO mad because he was insinuating that I said "This is wrong, you are doing this incorrectly." ALL I said was "this is more blonde than I expected." So he was basically accusing me of accusing him which is NOT what happened. I felt very attacked. I explained that the issue was that I misunderstood, and that I never accused him of being wrong or doing it incorrectly. The problem was just that neither the process nor the time investment were explained to me.Ahmed did give me $30 off and try to give me free shampoo, but these things were way too little too late. Again, the issue wasn't with the hair because it turned out not blonde (although the technique was not great, because the dye is streaky and poorly blended in many places). The issue was with the way he handled it. If he had simply said "I'm sorry I didn't explain what what happening, this is what we're going to do" I would have been totally fine. Instead, he got very defensive and attacked me and was very rude. I'm glad that so many other people have had good experiences here, but I was treated terribly and would not sink FOUR TOTAL HOURS into a haircut again, even if it were great (which it wasn't).

25.description: This place is amazing! It was my first time going in this past Friday. Ahmed colored, cut and styled my hair and I could not believe how great it turned out...(The last place I went to did not do such a great job so he had to fix all that). I was actually surprised by the fact that my hair looked more healthier AFTER the color than before. I am always paranoid above damaging my hair but Ahmed's technique and products that he used really set this place apart from other salons. They will not let you leave until you are completely satisfied. For me it didn't take much because everything he did was phenomenal. The way he cut my hair and layered it completely changed the shape of my face. Crazy how just a haircut and color touch-up can change up your whole look. Even if you aren't sure what you want done, Ahmed will give you his honest advice on what he thinks will work best for your hair and face shape. Also I have never had a blow out last so long and look so awesome...It was celebrity level work. Was super impressed. Will definitely come back.

12.description: Generally I do not write reviews, but Mish is exceptionally good at what he does. He has been my stylist for the past 6 years and wherever he goes, I go. I've been to many different stylists and I have to say that there is absolutely no comparison!!! Not only does he do an amazing job with hair cuts, he is fantastic with color and up-do's. One of my personal favorites would have to be the Keratin treatment. My hair was completely damaged and now it is long, healthy and manageable. Certainly, he is capable of doing anything! Every time I request a certain style he makes it better than I imagined. Never have I been dissatisfied with any service! That in my opinion means a lot!

59.description: If you want the greatest manicure and pedicure that you have ever had, be sure to see Nina at Trio 3 Hair Salon and Spa. Nina is the best. You will love her, as I do! The Trio have created an atmosophere that is condusive to relaxation, retreat and renewal. You will want to visit soon!

21.description: Great for men too. After my wife went in for a cut at Trio 3 Hair Salon & Spa and came out with a great new look, she told me to go there as well. It was all perfect timing - she just had a great experience here and I happened to come home with another bad haircut from one of those chain barbers. Regardless, I just got my hair cut and couldn't be happier. Lol, I'm sure the wife will pleased as well. Happy wife, happy life :)

17.description: I must give special shout out to Nina! One of the best pedicures and manicures I had in a long long time.  The pedicure Is outstanding!  She gives a full hour pedicure.  She gives attention to every toenail.  The foot massage is so relaxing.  If you need a professional and relaxing mani and pedi see Nina! And she has the sweetest personality.

10.description: I absolutely love Trio 3 Hair Salon & SPA. Whether your hair is straight, curly or coarse kinky, they are experts in delvering the color, cut, style and expert care you are seeking. They are the only Egyptians that I have ever experienced do not burn out your hair. Mish, Emad, and Ahmed are professionals,  men of intrgrity and honor. I have been going to them  for the last 5 years and always love my hair.Their place is elegant, classy and georgeous. Stop by for a visit.

5.description: I came to this salon for a haircut right after they opened and was so impressed with my cut from Emad. I have long blond hair and usually my requests are simple, but no other haircut seemed to add as much dimension to my hair as this cut! When I returned again for round 2 with Emad, I learned he has been doing hair for over 20 years, started in Jordan and then spent time learning and cutting hair in Italy. He feels so passionate about his craft, it is no wonder I loved my hair so much! He really knows what he is doing. For their price and level of quality, I definitely recommend this studio!

3.description: This place is amazing! It was my first time going in this past Friday. Ahmed colored, cut and styled my hair and I could not believe how great it turned out...(The last place I went to did not do such a great job so he had to fix all that). I was actually surprised by the fact that my hair looked more healthier AFTER the color than before. I am always paranoid above damaging my hair but Ahmed's technique and products that he used really set this place apart from other salons. They will not let you leave until you are completely satisfied. For me it didn't take much because everything he did was phenomenal. The way he cut my hair and layered it completely changed the shape of my face. Crazy how just a haircut and color touch-up can change up your whole look. Even if you aren't sure what you want done, Ahmed will give you his honest advice on what he thinks will work best for your hair and face shape. Also I have never had a blow out last so long and look so awesome...It was celebrity level work. Was super impressed. Will definitely come back.

35.description: Delightful experience. I came in for a last minute haircut because after 5 months of letting it go, I needed a cut, like, RIGHT NOW. The receptionist was very sweet and fit me in for an appointment after work. Emad was wonderful! He heard my vague concerns about having fine, flat hair and offered to add more volume with shorter layers. We all know that bad layers will ruin any look you have going, but I decided to trust him and I'm so glad I did! I love my hair and style, but more importantly, I am so impressed at how he was willing and able to customize my cut to match my hair texture and styling goals. What a professional! Their prices are comparable to other salons in the city, but the haircut I just got is way above.

19.description: Awesome salon!  I came in needing a haircut badly. When Ahmed sat me down and saw what my over processed hair looked like (I've been dying it various shades of blonde for 2 years and curl/straighten it weekly) he broke the news that there would be no trim.  There was about 5-6 inches of dead ends.  Yikes.  I was scared to death since my hair hasn't been above my shoulders in years but I could tell it needed to be done.  Thank god Ahmed is such a talented stylist.  I came in expecting to leave a few inches shorter but came out love love loving my new short hair!!!  Price was $65 for a cut and blow dry.  Highly recommended.

28.description: International Chic!  I went in for a blow dry as a walk in and was given to Mish, a co-owner!  He was remarkably focused and deliberate, drying small sections at a time and gently rolling each section in Velcro rollers.  I am a serial blow dry addict and I knew I immediately that I was dealing with a true professional.  I was so impressed that I went back for a hair cut which was fabulous and then again for color and highlights.  My hair has never looked so healthy and stylish.  Each timed I left the salon feeling as though I could take on  London, New York or Hong Kong.  I love the boutique atmosphere and, Jane, who gives a 15 minutes scalp massage, as she washes your hair.  This will be my weekly hang out for blow dries and monthly for other services.  I found the prices to be more competitive than any blow dry bar or salon even in the suburbs of Chicago.

45.description: This salon is perfection! Beaitiful, clean, and relaxing. I got the royal treatment! Thank you Emad! You always make me feel beautiful!

33.description: This place is great. I followed Ahmed from Yehia here. Ahmed always gives a great haircut with more than attentive service for a very reasonable value. This place is stylish with spa-like features.

43.description: I love this place...1) While getting the best manicure ever I watched the stylist cut hair to perfection! I saw men walking out of there with perfect haircuts. I liked looking at themselves in the mirror with a surprised look on their faces! Amazing technique and excellent styles! 2) They worked on diverse hair textures with the same enthusiasm. I saw an African American woman with thick course waist length hair get a blow out and a trim (looked amazing). The same stylist cut a White mans hair and the guy was beaming in the mirror at his reflection. A moment later a woman with curly red hair came in and he cut and styled her into a bushy bob that once again caused a glowing beaming smile and multiple thank you's.3) I was there for spa services. The spa pedicure is long, because they take their time and make everything perfect. The manicures were also lengthy, because she soaked my hands with a towel, gave me a massage and did the maintenance work that they do on the cuticles. Not only does this place look great... All of the stylists were excellent. The spa is the best I've ever had.

2.description: Ok...After getting a wonderful cut almost a week later...I did the craziest thing ever!! I "thought" a piece of hair was a little bit long. So, what did I do? I cut it at home. :/ for full disclosure, NO I don't know what in the hell was I thinking. I was feeling impulsive that morning. I show up for a blow dry and Ahmed immediately noticed the difference. We both laughed at what I did to myself and his work. I jokingly told Ahmed he did this to me and how can he let me walk around looking like this. I don't know why my "Jedi" mind tricking wasn't working that day. The force must not be with me. Thankfully, Ahmed patiently fixed the problem I created. We both agreed to leave my hair in his hands because I don't know WTF I'm doing. What initially was supposed to be a a simple wash and blow dry turned into fixing the hot mess. I left the salon with an edgy bob and looking 100% better. I'm confident when Ahmed sees my name on the appointment schedule, he'll wonder what does this client have in store for me this time. Maybe I'll try coloring my hair at home and give Ahmed another challenge ;0).On second thought....nah!!!

18.description: I have been getting my hair cut by the same person for 27 years.  Now that I moved to the city and sold my car I needed to find someone new.  I was very hesitant about finding someone new and did a ton of research which brought me to this salon and Mish.I went in and the front desk staff was very nice.  The girl who shampooed my hair was very friendly and gave a nice little head massage .Mish did an AMAZING job with my hair.  I showed him a few pictures, said i trusted him, and I have never been more pleased with a haircut.  He took his time and then did a blow dry and style.  I received so many compliments.  I will definitely be coming back and I can happily say I found my new hair dresser. My only small piece of room for improvement is how the receptionist answers the phone.  When i called they just said hello - not something like 'Hello this is Trio Salon' which made me feel like i dialed a wrong number.  I was caught off guard and has to ask if this was the salon to which she just said yes.  It might help to have a bit more of a profesional greeting so customers know they have the right place.

41.description: Mira is an amazing esthetician. She is completely professional and is very skilled. She is a complete sweet heart and will make sure you enjoy your time at Trio. The salon is beautiful and the entire staff is amazing. Highly recommend this place for everyone!

52.description: I checked the Internet and Yelp and came upon this place. I wanted a last minute booking and they fit me in. Emad was patient and gave me his honest feedback. He listened and his suggestions were right on the $! I adore my new cut and color. He corrected my hair and made it feel and look like it use to. They've scored a customer for life!

50.description: This Salon is Amazing and Mish is one of the best stylist in Chicago! Trio 3 hair salon & spa is Amazing!

4.description: I decided to give this place a try. I got my hair trimmed today by Mish. He was really nice and asked me what I wanted. My hair is fine and straight. I told him I just wanted a trim with my layers cleaned up. He took his time with my cut and checked with me with the length before he actually cut just to make sure I was comfortable with the amount being taken off. Totally appreciated that. After the cut he dryers my hair and used a round brush and Velcro rollers and my hair actually had volume! Why can't I do this myself? I love my cut and style and even though I just wanted long layers he made it look nice. My husband approved! I will be back!The salon is really nice and inviting, a nice addition to the neighborhood for sure! Glad I decided to check them out! My hair cut was 70 which is about 10 dollars more than what I usually pay but it's worth it. I'm very happy with my cut!

6.description: I love this place...1) While getting the best manicure ever I watched the stylist cut hair to perfection! I saw men walking out of there with perfect haircuts. I liked looking at themselves in the mirror with a surprised look on their faces! Amazing technique and excellent styles! 2) They worked on diverse hair textures with the same enthusiasm. I saw an African American woman with thick course waist length hair get a blow out and a trim (looked amazing). The same stylist cut a White mans hair and the guy was beaming in the mirror at his reflection. A moment later a woman with curly red hair came in and he cut and styled her into a bushy bob that once again caused a glowing beaming smile and multiple thank you's.3) I was there for spa services. The spa pedicure is long, because they take their time and make everything perfect. The manicures were also lengthy, because she soaked my hands with a towel, gave me a massage and did the maintenance work that they do on the cuticles. Not only does this place look great... All of the stylists were excellent. The spa is the best I've ever had.

22.description: I was having a hard time finding a replacement after my Stylist of 20 years moved away. I decided to try Salon Trio since it's by my house, and I'm so happy I did! Mish did a great job with my curly hair, and after the third visit I know I finally found a permanent Hair Stylist!

15.description: I LOVEEEEEE THIS PLACE!!!!!! THE BEST EXPERIENCE I EVER HAD!!! I had 30 inches long hair and I got Mish to cut my hair up to my shoulders and to give me layers. Then I asked for a turquoise ombre and OMG..THE BEST DECISION OF MY LIFE!! I wish I found them sooner! I had 3 people working on my hair making sure everything went smoothly. THIS SALON ROCKS and trust the reviews on here! Mish and Emad and Jay helped create my pinterest worthy hair ...Thank YOU SO MUCH!

57.description: I went to Emad for a trim; and Im so glad I did! I recently moved from the suburbs to Chicago and needed a new stylist and went to Trio based on their great reviews and great pricing. Emad was great, and it was honestly the best haircut I've ever had. I walked out of the salon feeling like a million bucks and plan on returning back soon for a blowout because his blowout after my haircut was incredible! I definitely recommend!

20.description: Great cut for a great price. Ahmed is skilled. I have "asian" guys hair, and he did a great job. This will be my new go to!

36.description: I must give special shout out to Nina! One of the best pedicures and manicures I had in a long long time.  The pedicure Is outstanding!  She gives a full hour pedicure.  She gives attention to every toenail.  The foot massage is so relaxing.  If you need a professional and relaxing mani and pedi see Nina! And she has the sweetest personality.

14.description: I finally found a salon I'll return to. Emad took the time to listen to me and suggest new ideas, giving me the benefit of his expertise and experience, while still carefully checking with me before he made any big cuts or changes. I have very thin, fine hair and have never found a cut that really worked to give it body, but Emad found the solution. Of course I looked great coming out of the salon, after Emad spent time styling me, but the new cut passed the real test when I washed it at night, didn't blow dry, and the next day it looked great with only a simple brush through (no products or curling). It still had shape and looked more voluminous than I ever managed with a hair dryer and lots of curling. I've never had a better cut. To top it off, the salon gives a very relaxing shampoo and massage and a leave-in conditioner,  steam treatment before the cut. Everyone at the salon is skilled, professional, and kind. I had a great experience.

attributes.Hair Types Specialized In: African-American Hair, Asian Hair, Curly Hair, Perms, Extensions, Straight Perms, Coloring, Kids' Hair

3.description: Christina's Skincare is a wonderful, serene oasis in a convenient South Loop location. Christina gave me a fabulous custom facial. She provided recommendations for home skincare with her awesome facial cleansing and moisturizing products. My face looks and feels moisturized, hydrated and beautiful. Thank you, Christina!!!

1.description: Once again I must rave! I'm loathing sharing my coveted secret to the beautiful skin that has been bestowed upon me by this wonderful aesthetician! Not to mention the intimate and beautiful space the service is rendered in! I'm so pleased I can't even rave about how wonderful this place is my skin feels silk after the wax & facial! Thanks Christina!

2.description: Christina is the best aesthetician out there! Always thorough, always professional, alway timely - she really makes it an experience.  I would (and do) recommend her to anyone and everyone that is looking for a top of the line facial or waxing service.  You will not be disappointed!

0.description: I visited Christina's Skin Care again this past weekend -- and again feel compelled to write a review (I already wrote one on 3/20). What an incredible experience. With her facial, Christina made my skin glow and feel healthy again. But that wasn't all! With her way of being and overall ambiance of her studio, she transformed how I felt that day.I walked in tired and stressed out and walked out energized and relaxed. I also loved her skin care-related recommendations - she took the time to explain how I could improve my skin. I felt that she genuinely cared about helping me get the results I'd like. She is a wonderful esthetician and just a beautiful human being.

4.description: I had a facial, massage, and wax, and I always feel fabulous when I leave Christina's Skin Care! As far the facial in concerned, my skin looks amazing after my treatment, and Christina is always honest in giving me advice about how to improve my skin. For waxing, the facility is very sterile and clean, and I never experience any in-grown hairs after the wax, and it's practically pain-free! The masseuse, Nasser, is incredible. I won;t go to anyone else for my massage. He's the best.

3.description: I really liked this place when it was Loopy Yarn, so I really wanted to take a class here.  Now that it has transitioned over, no one answers the phone, phone calls are not returned, and I cannot get any info on the classes!  I'm not ready to write them off completely yet, but this has been frustrating.

1.description: New owner has taken over former Loopy Yarn location. Which in my humble opinion was the best yarn shop in Chicago. This new owner has a lot to learn about retail and owning a shop where the number one priority should be making her customer(s) happy. The name of the shop might be more appropriate than the owner thinks: Yarnify! Or is it really Yarn-iffy?The owner is not friendly or engaging; thankfully she has got a great team of Krista, Meg and Megan. The 3 ladies have a ton of experience with knitting, crocheting, spinning and all things creative. The owner does not knit. I tried to make a purchase with my credit card and the phone rang and disconnected the transaction. Really? Need more than 1 line, maybe.Then, people show up for help knitting or help with projects and the new owner stays upstairs and does not engage with people who come to knit there and spend money in her shop; again showing how unfriendly she is...Hey Yarnify, here's a clue - be nice to everyone who walks in that door or you will be reading very shortly about the demise of what used to be the best yarn shop in Chicago!!!

2.description: I shopped at Loopy for many years, took multiple classes and bought all my supplies exclusively from them.  Part of the reason I did this was because the staff is fantastic- they remember your face, your projects and are always super helpful.  I love Krista and Meg.  I now live 1,600 miles away but still frequently stop in (as I travel to Chicago each month) to buy my yarn and share my projects but have recently been disappointed in the new ownership.  You can clearly tell the owner is not used to working with customers, she isn't engaging and at times I found her rude.  The first time I stopped in was just before close as I was going downstairs to an open knit.  I told her I would be quick as I was just picking up a few balls.  She asked me three times if I wanted them all wound which I told her the first time I did.  Under her breath she said she had to close because her husband was waiting.  When I told her I travel to her shop because I like(d) the selection she asked me "if I thought about shopping local"?!  Seriously!  Aren't you a small business owner?  Don't you know that there are a million sites online that I can buy my supplies from (usually for slightly less)?  The new owner does not knit, which is fine, but the selection of yarns for knitters has certainly declined and while I used to always be able to find exactly what I was looking for at Loopy in the past that has not been the case when I have visited the last three times (and I have had to order online).  I'm giving 3 stars because I still like the ladies that work there, and I'll try to make it in for knit alongs etc. I'll just call ahead to see if they have yarn before I take the EL to the Loop from now on.  I hope as the new owner transitions that Yarnify! can become what Loopy was.

0.description: I've always been a huge fan of Loopy, and was sad to hear Vicki was passing on the torch. Fortunately, Yarnify has not changed too much, and has rather given a new breath of life into the store. The selection has expanded, and they now offer some exclusive, gorgeous yarn spun by local artists.I've only been in once since the change, but I will be back very soon! I love the energy and the salespeople are caring, knowledgeable, and accommodating. I'm excited to see the new directions this location is about to explore!

29.description: Skye is great. Found her online via groupon and she had so many great reviews I decided to try her out for a Brazilian wax and while I was scared , Skye made me feel relaxed and made sure I understood everything she used. She also helped me clear up my acne on my skin with some tips for skin care. For sure coming back!!

42.description: So I was a first timer and I was nervous but Skye was so helpful and she just chatted with me the whole time and seriously way less pain than expected. If you can sit through a tattoo I feel that you could sit through this!She also uses chocolate wax which is better for the skin and it hurts a lot less! It smells so good too!! Skye is a wonderful person as well as excellent esthetician. I used a groupon here and I would still pay for her only to do any waxes that I need and she also does other beauty and skin care, check out her website!

23.description: This was my very first experience getting a Brazilian wax and to say that I was nervous is an understatement. I scheduled my appointment and almost cancelled a few times because you hear those horror stories about getting things like this done. Well I must say that Skye Rose was AMAZING. She was very comforting and reassuring. What made this such an amazing experience is how kind and personable she is. It was literally like talking to one of my best friends during the wax. She also uses a chocolate wax that smells great!  She made the experience a great one and I will definitely be going back. My next appointment is coming up soon and I will definitely be bringing my sister as well.  I would highly recommend.

47.description: I have been searching for someone to get waxing done for some time now... Was tired of venturing so far up north. I found and purchased a Groupon after reading some reviews for sky.  I went In today for my first appt. to get a Brazilian and I have to say, I was more than impressed!!! Sky was Great!!! The whole experience was wonderful... The room was clean and had a nice smell (she uses chocolate wax).  She was super sanitary!!! Each stick was used only once and then dumped :).  I was so comfortable and we had good conversation.Sky will definitely be my regular waxing aesthetician.  I was happy to find an African American who understand our hair type.Thank you Sky for a wonderful experience.  See u next month!!! :)

8.description: I am a Groupon person and I had done Brazilian waxes services in a lot of places around Chicago. However, after my Groupon at Skye Rose I have stopped searching for something better, because it was just a phenomenal service. My previous experiences were so painful and I was sure that how it is suppose to be, but after visiting Skye I realized how wrong I was. The technique and wax that she uses are the way less painful as in big brand name salons where I had done it before. The most amazing part that she doesn't charge that much for her services. If you are new to the wax procedure, this is the best place to start at! And if you are not, go and check her out, you would not regret!

31.description: My lucky stars brought me to her when I saw a Groupon offer for her famous chocolate waxes.  Since then, she is the only beautician I see because she is phenomenal at what she does. She's incredibly professional, punctual and so friendly that you almost forget why you've stopped in.  I would recommend her to anyone, from a seasoned waxer to someone just trying it out, because she makes it nearly painless, despite being thorough with the job.  Furthermore, her customer service will astound you.  Skye is always accommodating and respects her clients' time and best interests.  And possibly one of the greatest things about her customer service is she allows you to book online, through her website.  So there's no need to take a moment out of your day to make a call or hope to catch her between sessions, and you can book in advance -- usually getting you the exact appointment you wanted.  I couldn't have anything but wonderful things to say about Skye Rose and her work!

34.description: I went to Skye on the recommendation of a coworker for a Brazilian wax. It was my first time, so I was---rightfully--a little scared. Listen to me-- DO NOT BE. Whether or not you've had this done before plays no part in my opinion. Skye is INCREDIBLE. She is funny, warm, gentle, hygienic, and GREAT at what she does. I absolutely can't wait to schedule another appointment. She immediately made me feel comfortable and like we were old friends, and even gave me a sweet little hug on my way out. Seriously-- make her part of your routine, and tip her nicely.

16.description: Skye is my GIRL!! Not only is she amazing at waxing but she is by far the most personable, down to earth indvidual who's ever worked on my lady parts. I actually enjoy my time at her place and that's saying A LOT because no woman likes being waxed raw! She uses chocolate wax as others mention and it definitely makes the waxing less painful. A great person to visit if you're unsure of getting a wax for the first time or looking for a change!

13.description: This was my first Brazilian wax and I was scared that it was going to really hurt . As I entered Skye's spa my senses were filled with inviting aromas. She was very professional and let me know exactly what she was going to do and the products she was going to use which were all natural and yummy smelling.  The whole experience was  great thanks to her and I would recommend her to anyone.  She has  a great sense of humor which was an added bonus!!

11.description: So I literally got an official Yelp account just to review Skye. She is AMAZING! I've been going to her for a few months now and I will never go to another Esthetician. I'll literally follow her wherever she goes lol. It's the least painful experiences I've ever had and I love the way my skin feels after. Skye knows what she's doing. Stop thinking and book now! Her schedule fills up fast.

39.description: After I used my Groupon deal for the waxing services, I went ahead and got another deal from her, she's that amazing! She's very professional, friendly and will make you feel at ease (if it's your first time). The services are affordable and the atmosphere is nice. I would recommend her 10 times over to anyone looking to get a wax.

37.description: I LOVED IT! Skye was amazing! She was down to earth and really friendly but still professional. It was my first time going, it wasn't that painful (for me) but she does try her best to stop the pain and to make you go to a happy place. I will from now on be a loyal customer for $25. The place is clean, comfortable, and soothing. Don't let anybody else tell you otherwise.

0.description: Skye is not only my go to for a Brazilian wax, she's also become a friend! Even moving away, every time I'm in Chicago I make sure to make an appointment with her! Quick, painless and chocolate waxing! Highly recommend!!

38.description: I had a Brazilian wax and it was one of the better ones I've ever had!She was super friendly! The place was very cozy! The price was great! It was essentially pain free! I would definitely recommend her!!

51.description: I got a groupon for a Brazilian and Skye did an amazing job. She knew how to keep my nerves down by talking to me because although I've gotten several brazilians done in the past I still become a nervous wreck. She used chocolate wax which she said would be less painful. It was quick and as pain free as possible! She also mentioned she would have the groupon up for a while.

27.description: This was my very first time getting a professional wax let alone a Brazilian wax and I must say that Skye Rose was awesome.  She was very informative, funny, down to earth and professional.  She made my first experience so amazing that I plan to make monthly visit going forward.  I would highly recommend her to all my friends and family.

32.description: Not sure how this place got 5 stars from people. Spent $50 for Brazilian waxing and double that in pain, suffering and medication!! I am not sure she knows how to wax...the job was not finished and she broke hairs all over. Had red bumps that turned into white heads. I rely on Yelp reviews to find places I want to visit and this one really let me down. still suffering 3 days later and who knows when I can go back to a real place and get it done correctly! Have to leave for a trip and look what I have to deal with!

48.description: I just went to Skye Rose and have to say she was very professional. She is centrally located and the room was clean and comfortable.Her prices are very good and definitely will become one of her regulars. Never had a Brazilian Chocolate waxing before smelt great, it was quick and minimum pain!

44.description: I found Skye on Groupon when I was looking to get waxed the groupon was for a $25 Brazilian which most of ladies know that's a steal. I live in the south loop so it was close and easy to get to. When I got there she had a really nice little private office with a separate waxing room. She was very friendly and did a great job. I was also pleased to know that she ALWAYS charges $25.00 for that service it wasnt' just the groupon. #winning

24.description: Very friendly and professional. Skye is great

7.description: Had my very first Brazilian wax done by sky rose and omg she is amazing! It did not hurt one bit and she is super sweet! She was easy to talk to and get along with. I went to her three times and will be making my next appointment before I leave to Cali in July! I highly recommend her to everybody.

49.description: Very professional. Location is convenient, intimate.  She made me feel very comfortable. Nice conversation and an excellent job on the brazilian wax. Quick and painless. I would definitely go back for another great services. She also gives very useful information for after care so if you visit her please follow all the after care instructions that she gives you.

40.description: I've been going to Skye for waxes for five months now and I can't recommend her highly enough.  She does a fantastic job and the whole process is quick, effective, and nearly pain-free.I was very nervous during my first visit since waxing had previously been one of the most painful experiences I've ever had.  Granted, it still hurt quite a bit, but Skye was wonderful and talked me through the whole thing.  I've been seeing her every three weeks since my initial visit and I'm so glad I stuck it out.  Now I can carry on a full conversation for the entire wax as though nothing is happening.What really sets Skye apart is that she transforms a part of my personal maintenance routine which is usually about as fun as a trip to the OB/GYN into an event I actually look forward to.  More than just providing an immaculate wax, Skye has an amazing personality/bedside manner which makes the whole experience relaxing and enjoyable.  I can tell she really cares about doing a great job and I trust her 100%.  I am consistently pleased with my visits to Skye and I don't know what I would do without her.  She is, without exception, the best aesthetician I've ever had.

30.description: Went with my best friend who made an appointment for us to go together.  Both of us have about a 0% tolerance for pain so we were both super nervous and on the verge of cancelling all together.  I'm glad we didnt though because it was definitely life changing!Location: Very convenient to get to with ample street metered parking.  The building is very nice and secured with other professional office spaces in the building as well.Ambiance: Very clean and spa-esque with a warm and inviting aura.  When I walked in she had already started her consultation with my bff and she told me I could come and sit in on her service.  She was immediately very friendly and it was like talking to a friend that you had known for years.  She makes it very easy to forget what shes doing because she truly engages you in conversation.  There is soft music playing and dim lighting with only one bright light for her to be able to work efficiently on your "work area".Service: She starts with a consultation letting you know exactly what she is going to do and why and also addresses any concerns you may have.  She gives you a few minutes to get undressed from waist down and then comes in to assess your situation (I was about as bushy as you can get and had worked all day and came straight from the train there and told her I was super self conscious about the "condition" that I was in.  She reassured me that I was fine and gave no judgement.  She says she has seen it all).  She began the service and as a first timer I was expecting the worst and it actually wasnt as bad as I thought.  Dont get me wrong its not completely painless because there are some areas that are more sensitive than others but she does a good job at minimizing the pain.  She used a combination of a cherry scented wax and a chocolate one depending on your needs.  She worked quickly and efficiently.  I had ALOT of hair and it was over before I knew it.Pricing: She charges a reasonable rate for her services.  Please tip her well!Overall: She deserves an A+.  I will definitely be going to see her again.

46.description: Skye is the best!  I bought a Groupon on my first visit, and she told me that $25 is the set Brazilian price.  This is the best price I've ever heard of, and she does the best job.  She uses a chocolate wax, which seemed less painful than previous waxing experiences.  I am so happy I found Skye!!  I've been back three times and am always satisfied.  She is friendly and professional, and I would recommend everyone giving her a call.  Her prices (especially Brazilians) are unbeatable so everyone should get one before bikini weather!

1.description: I have a testimonial!!!! Skye Rose provided me with my FIRST BEST waxing experience. What I mean is this: This was my very first visit with Skye, my hair was short and really not to the point where a Brazillian waxing could be thoroughly CLEAN. Normally there are a few stubs or extra hairs. NOT TODAY!!! She took the extra time to clean away any stubborn hair providing me with a smooth surface. No sting.. Let me repeat, NO STING!!!! Many thanks for your work Ms. Rose!

9.description: I cannot believe how painless this wax really was! Obviously waxing hurts a bit but this is the closest you'll ever get to a "comfortable" wax. Skye is great at what she does! She used a chocolate wax and a combination of other things to make it hurt less and it worked. I told her I was nervous and freaked out because of a bad experience on Devon and she heard me out. Very reassuring. I'll be recommending her to friends.

26.description: This was my first Brazilian wax and I was scared that it was going to really hurt . As I entered Skye's spa my senses were filled with inviting aromas. She was very professional and let me know exactly what she was going to do and the products she was going to use which were all natural and yummy smelling.  The whole experience was  great thanks to her and I would recommend her to anyone.  She has  a great sense of humor which was an added bonus!!

25.description: Best wax ever. This was the least painful and most relaxing wax! It was my fourth wax ever and I was scared from my last wax experience but this was really good. Sky uses chocolate wax and cherry wax and other natural based products and it makes for a very good experience. I will be going again and again every few weeks :)Thanks Sky!

12.description: Went to Skye for the first time today. I've already told four friends. I never knew waxing could be this pain free and relaxing. I've tried different types of wax before and I don't know if it's the wax Skye uses or the lighting, or just how comfortable Skye makes you feel, or the combination of everything, but I had no pain, it was quick, and I'm not dreading my next visit. At previous salons I've always had to point out missed hairs. Not today! Skye found every one. So happy with my service today!

21.description: I've had a ton of waxes, but this was the least painful I've ever had. The lidocaine she uses numbs you a tad, but the technique she uses is the real magic. I've been here twice so far and plan to make this my regular spot. I came here on a deal from yelp (there's also always deals on groupon), but she usually has done pretty good package deals that end up being $25/wax.  I highly recommend this salon!

17.description: I've finally found a place closer to home! I tried Skye through Groupon after reading so many great reviews. Honestly, I was a little (VERY) nervous since time had passed from my last waxing (so this was like a first time wax). The room was clean. Skye explained her products, what they do, and what she will do. Her technique is what I believe made the difference! I didn't have the chance to even imagine how much more we had to go. We had wonderful conversation as she did the procedure. She was even nice to make me stop talking and take a deep breath at a sensitive spot. Skye cleaned me up very well (I've had places leave spots which can be bothersome). I left with no pain or funny feeling down there. Needless to say, I will definitely be back and am happy to have found someone that is into skin care as well. She is highly recommended!!

10.description: So I had my first Brazilian and I was expecting a lot of pain but Skye is seriously amazing. She uses 2 different kinds of wax to make it as least painful as possible. Not saying it was painless, but it was completely bearable. I'd definitely go back again. She is very thorough and just awesome in general. Missy, he coworker, is also very sweet.I got this deal off of Groupon and it was so worth it!!! But I'd still pay for it with her.

5.description: Love Skye's professional yet super friendly attitude! She's great at her waxing; went here for a Brazilian & it was quick, non-painful & clean. She talks to you about anything & everything during the waxing process so you don't really focus on the pain, which really helps!! The only thing to watch out for is the building's entrance door (which Skye cribs enough about haha); never works even when you enter the access code! So you just have to try your luck or wait for someone to open it for you. Overall, a must try folks! Oh & Skye's got great deals even if you don't have a Groupon so it's great!

3.description: For my first Brazilian wax or wax experience ever, Skye Rose was professional and pleasant. I love how friendly and gentle she was during the waxing process. She was hygienic and I believe her oils are all natural.  She was full of pleasant conversation and information. I loved the experience and recommend her to anyone for waxing services.

35.description: Let me start by saying I have not received any services from SkyeRose, however if the level of customer service she has shown me so far is anything like her work then I am well on my way to being a loyal customer. After reviewing the comments and checking out her website and discovering she was running an awesome promotion on BW, but unsuccessfully being able to book an appointment, I contacted her directly. The service I wanted wasn't listed at the promotional price and there were no appointments within a time frame that worked well with my schedule. SkyeRose responded promptly with instructions on how to proceed and even offered additional times that would work for her. It's important to add that I was requesting to have the service performed in less than 24hrs. Although her schedule and mine ended up not working out, I am very appreciative that she went the extra mile to correspond with me outside of her regular work hours to try to make the appointment happen. Based on her diligence in trying to assist a completely random customer is impressive and I look forward to patronizing her in the near future.

19.description: Best wax ever. This was the least painful and most relaxing wax! It was my fourth wax ever and I was scared from my last wax experience but this was really good. Sky uses chocolate wax and cherry wax and other natural based products and it makes for a very good experience. I will be going again and again every few weeks :)Thanks Sky!

28.description: Great service for a first timer getting a Brazilian (oh, already TMI).  Missy took great care of me in the clean facility.  Very professional and did not make an awkward experience, awkward, if that makes any sense.  I called a few places, none would take men.  Anyway, I did it (for running), quite pleased!  I highly recommend!

45.description: LOVE! A small very clean and quiet location.  Skye is very personable as well as professional.  I've had services here in my city but hers is top notch! She makes you feel at ease and her technique helps to lessen the pain.  Let's not forget to mention that her wax is CHOCOLATE!! She now has a customer in me and whenever I am in the city I will definitely book with her!

33.description: Skye was very professional, and extremely pleasant.  Her space is very comfortable, and the location was very easy to access.  The best part - I went home smelling like chocolate!

43.description: Skye is extremely professional and made me feel very comfortable. I went in for a Brazilian and lower leg wax. The procedure was fast and not as painful as regular wax.  Skye is very personable as well as knowledgeable. The chocolate wax was an added plus. Before leaving I booked another appointment! I will definitely be returning. Also the prices are great!!
